title: DDoser's in oce...

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: I joined a norms game and all of sudden im getting 999 ping when trying to connect so i close down the client and start it up again and still 999 ping i thought it was just me but when i eventually connected i had 5000ping and my whole team was d/c and the enemy team where all playing killing all the towers so wtf... this is such bs riot fk your servers

replies.body:
That's not really how an attacker would go about doing it. Usually, denial of service attacks occur when someone wants to completely shutdown a server, so having the ability to prevent certain players from connecting would not be the purpose of that.

The alternative is if someone knows your IP address and is specifically targeting you, as well as your team-mates, which is illegal. You'd want to triple-check make sure it's not just a connection issue on your end before getting the law involved.
